channel.title: Runecopys server development needs ur help
channel.description:
WE currently have many people in our program we also need more alot more so that a server can get done 10 times faster than normal
our devlopment leaders are 1. *ballin*/*baller* 2. coder ((skill)) our websight is http://runecopys.co.nr/ do not spam or anything make sure u read the rules when u get on if u break them we will record ur ip adress and take action
current needs - server hoster if posible 20/7 24/7 and no to minimum lag - we are currently recruiting people for shops and gfx - we also need client workers to make a workable client and if posible a webclient u will also need to code the server for the client to such as special items and such
thankyou if u are intrested reply and i will get back to u plz also register at our websight http://runecopys.co.nr/ if u are interested
